sourcesContent:
{{ code }}
import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-code-block', templateUrl: './code-block.component.html', styleUrls: ['./code-block.component.css'] }) export class CodeBlockComponent { @Input() code: string = ''; isEditing = false; editedCode: string = ''; startEditing() { this.isEditing = true; this.editedCode = this.code; } saveChanges() { this.isEditing = false; this.code = this.editedCode; } }
